Note for all proposals: for a better visualization of the 14x14px icon size, maybe is better to use a puzzle only icon as <nowiki>[[Jazzva]]</nowiki> suggested to me: <nowiki>[[File:MozExtTeamLogo_volans_4_14x14.png]]</nowiki>

Author: <nowiki>[[Volans]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~volans|LP page]]</nowiki>)

SVG: free to ask me the SVG source images if necessary.

License: <nowiki>[[http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/fdl.html|GFDL]]</nowiki>

Comments: My simple idea for this Team logo is the unification of an earth globe (that stand for Firefox) made by <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-it.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2771|Re.in.stallo]]</nowiki> and the GFDL puzzle icon (that stand for extension) I have found <nowiki>[[http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Image:Wiki_puzzle.svg|here]]</nowiki> on Wikimedia and modified by myself. Alternatively also the puzzle icon alone can be enough representative for the Team.

Author: <nowiki>[[ReInStallo]]</nowiki>

SVG: Feel free to ask me the SVG source images if necessary.

License: GPL v2 or any newer version

Comments: 
  I have enhanced the idea of Volans of "merging" an earth globe with a puzzle icon (in two "flavors"). I followed the <nowiki>[[Jazzva]]</nowiki>'s suggestion of using a puzzle-only icon for the 14x14px icon. I apologize for the lateness of these proposals... 

=== Votes (most liked first) ===

** jetsaredim - I like proposal 1 Blue and/or Jazzva's suggestion of just the puzzle icon like in the addons console.
** asac - Proposal 1 Orange or proposal 4
** fta - Proposal 1 Orange
** gnomefreak - Proposal 1 Orange
** <nowiki>[[rzr]]</nowiki> - B9 B11 A4 / A2 A6 / A1 A5 / A3 A7 (most liked first)
** RainCT - Proposal 1 Blue
** Jazzva - B11, A5, A4
